q: Always render more and better service than is expected of you, no matter what your task may be.
Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy.
Get mad, then get over it.
The degree of responsibility you take for your life determines how much change you can create in it.
Love is the expression of one's values.
Sad thing is, you can still love someone and be wrong for them.
In order to control myself I must first accept myself by going with and not against my nature.
Your worth consists in what you are and not in what you have.
A single dream is more powerful than a thousand realities.
We shape clay into a pot, but it is the emptiness inside that holds whatever we want.
Every man's work, whether it be literature or music or pictures or architecture or anything else, is always a portrait of himself.
Progress comes to those who train and train; reliance on secret techniques will get you nowhere.
Those who look for the bad in people will surely find it.
So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
The greater the impact you want to make, the greater your influence needs to be.
To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
One mistake does not have to rule a person's entire life.
Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
You are not what you think you are, You are not what others think you are, You are what you think others think you are.
We would accomplish many more things if we did not think of them as impossible.
Even if you stumble and fall down, it doesn't mean you've chosen the wrong path.
Disobedience is the true foundation of liberty. The obedient must be slaves.
Closing your eyes and listening to silence is self-care.
We cannot expect to be happy always... by experiencing evil as well as good we become wise.
The price of inaction is far greater than the cost of making a mistake.
The opportunity of defeating the enemy is provided by the enemy himself.
All human wisdom is contained in these two words - Wait and Hope
It is useless to meet revenge with revenge; it will heal nothing.
I discovered a long time ago that if I helped enough people get what they wanted, I would always get what I wanted and I would never have to worry.
Don't be afraid to go slowly. Be afraid of stopping.
The dreamers are the saviors of the worlds.
Everyone is a moon, and has a dark side which he never shows to anybody.
May you find grace as you surrender to life. May you find happiness, as you stop seeking it.
When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself
Failure is just information and an opportunity to change your course.
Focus on how far you have come in life rather than looking at the accomplishments of others.
High thoughts must have high language.
The road to success is always under construction.
The biggest adventure is what lies ahead.
I enjoy life when things are happening. I don't care if it's good things or bad things. That means you're alive.
The man who moved the mountain was the one who began carrying away the smallest stones.
There is peace even in the storm.
We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment.
The future belongs to those who learn more skills and combine them in creative ways.
Peace is not something you wish for; It's something you make, something you do, something you are, and something you give away.
If you quit once it becomes a habit.
Your greatest asset is your earning ability. Your greatest resource is your time.
Storms don't last forever.
It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
